author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Oklahoma star surprises girlfriend with proposal
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Oklahoma star surprises girlfriend with proposal Oklahoma star surprises girlfriend with a super cute proposal Post to Facebook Oklahoma star surprises girlfriend with proposal Oklahoma star surprises girlfriend with a super cute proposal Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/oklahoma-star-surprises-girlfriend-with-a-super-cute-proposal/ Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Oklahoma star surprises girlfriend with proposal Luke Kerr-Dineen , USA TODAY Sports 10:13 a.m. ET Feb. 19, 2017 
Oklahoma Running Back Samaje Perine will leave college with more rushing yards than anybody else in his school's history, and now, thanks to this charming gesture, he'll enter the NFL Draft an engaged man. 
For help, Perine secured the services of Magician Daniel Fernandez thanks to a handful of Starbucks gift cards. Fernandez made them the subjects of a series of tricks before, via a playing card with a surprise message written on it, he set the stage for Perine to pop the question.
